column4: I'm trying to install 10.10 via cd that I know is bootable but for some reason my dell E6400 doesn't see at as bootable, even a flash drive is not bootable. what am I missing?
via cd burner on mac os x.  I know they are bootable because when I use them on other computers they are recognized as bootable
I know flash drives are a pain to put Ubuntu on from OS X
